reviewText: This is a really great video.  BUT watch it all the way through first, then go back and work along with her section by section.  I didn't watch all the way through and ironed when I shouldn't have and it did make a difference.  But well done video that a beginner can understand.

This DVD will not disappoint you!  Jan shares her tips and techniques that will ensure your lone star quilt is a success.  The video is bright and colorful and Jan's narration is clear and precise.

Each step to create a perfect lone star is laid out clearly and the close-up shots really show exactly how you can achieve the precision that makes this a stunning quilt.

There are some new techniques Jan uses and she shares all of these with you at home.  Its just like she is in your sewing room helping you every step of the way.  Nothing is left out, everything is explained and shown well.

I highly recommend this DVD, you will be so glad to have this instructional DVD in your collection.  It is beautifully filmed in Jan's own studio.  Jan gives you hints on fabric selection, color coordination, rotary cutting, accuracy and much more.

This terrific DVD features the Lone Star Design & construction process, start to finish. It is a colorful, exciting "workshop at home" and an excellent resource companion to the book, Lone Star Quilts and Beyond. If you have always wanted to make a star quilt and never had the time, or thought it would be too complicated - you will love watching the process and be amazed by how straight-forward the technique is, and how successful YOUR quilt will be! Happy Stitching! Jan Krentz
